description: This schema describes a geotoolkit Unit instance
title: Unit Schema

quantitytype.description: Represents the type of the unit

symbol.description: The symbol string representing the unit.
symbol.title: Symbol

baseunitsymbol.description: The symbol string representing the baseunit.
baseunitsymbol.title: Symbol

a.description: One of the factors used to convert a unit into the base unit
a.title: A factor

b.title: B factor

c.description: One of the factors used to convert a unit into the base unit
c.title: C factor

d.description: One of the factors used to convert a unit into the base unit
d.title: D factor

description.description: The readable description of the unit.
description.title: Description
